com.jenjinstudios.io.connection

Class SingleConnectionBuilder<T extends ExecutionContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jenjinstudios.io.connection.SingleConnectionBuilder<T>

  • public class SingleConnectionBuilder<T extends ExecutionContext>
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to configure and create a Connection.

        Throws:
